blocks.heading: Page Content Summary
blocks.content: Electrical and Computer Engineering Fragment Offset The fragment offset field is measured in units of eight-byte blocks. It is 13 bits long and specifies the offset of a particular fragment relative to the beginning of the original unfragmented IP datagram. The first fragment has an offset of zero.
